segments.text: Steven , why are you so depressed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm feeling very sad . I just read the newspaper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: According to the newspaper , the town was razed by an earthquake and more than 10 thousand people died in the earthquake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , we have to do something to help the people in the stricken area .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . How about donating some money ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a good idea . But where can we donate money ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just find the answer through Internet .
segments.speaker: S1
